channel.title: Need Help Creating A Webclient
channel.description: well title says it all. i have jarmaker and ive made a file where u click it and client comes up. it works for me but when my friend downloaded it it said "error connecting to server" i have to change the ip? and if i do how do i do that? please someone help me. Add me on skype "rave2techno"

item.title: Need Help Creating A Webclient
item.dc:creator: @0ffz 0ffz
item.description:
@0ffz wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:2, topic:524060”]Be sure, that your friend does have cache for your server, and client of his is directed to your IP.
If in your Friend’s client reads ‘‘127.0.0.1’’ it wont work since it tries to connect to his own computer.

Remember to keep 1 copy of client, which will connect to 127.0.0.1 if you want to connect on your host computer.[/quote]

add me on skype please? “rave2techno”

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Creating A Webclient
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Be sure, that your friend does have cache for your server, and client of his is directed to your IP.
If in your Friend’s client reads ‘‘127.0.0.1’’ it wont work since it tries to connect to his own computer.

Remember to keep 1 copy of client, which will connect to 127.0.0.1 if you want to connect on your host computer.

Read full topic
